channel.title: oss on Ayrat's Braindump
channel.description: Recent content in oss on Ayrat's Braindump

item.title: Company-elixir
item.description: company-elixir is a company-mode completion backend for Elixir. It uses a separate IEx (Elixir’s interactive shell) process to fetch completions from. I abandoned this project but it can be used as a reference for async company backends .

item.title: Cryptopunk
item.description: Cryptopunk is Hierarchical deterministic wallet implementation for Elixir. It implements the following BIPs: BIP 32 - Hierarchical Deterministic Wallets BIP 39 - Mnemonics BIP 44 - Multi-Account Hierarchy for Deterministic Wallets

item.title: emacs env for elixir
item.description: Create a setup for elixir dev in emacs. Like unmaintained `alchemist`

item.title: Ethereumex
item.description: Ethereumex - Elixir JSON-RPC client for the Ethereum blockchain Key features: Supports IPC and HTTP Batch requests Custom RPC calls Complete wrapper for Ethereum API It was my first Ethereum related library. I wrote the first version over one weekend. Backlog check if new methods are added

item.title: ExABI
item.description: ExABI - the ABI encoding implementation for Elixir. It’s used for communication with Ethereum smart contracts. The specification can be found in Solidity docs

item.title: ExPBKDF2
item.description: ExPBKDF2 - Rust NIf for Password-Based Key Derivation Function v2 (PBKDF2) . It uses the pbkdf2 rust library.

item.title: HD wallets for Elixir
item.description: Hierarchical deterministic wallet is a wallet that may generate a new key pair from a master key pair for each crypto transaction to enhance privacy and security. There is already an implementation for bitcoin . But it seems not maintained. Also it doesn’t support related chains like Dogecoin.
